excerpt: "According to the Digital Therapeutics Alliance, DTx \"deliver to patients evidence-based therapeutic interventions that are driven by high quality software programs to treat, manage, or prevent a disease or disorder.\" The alliance also noted that the interventions are provided independently or alongside medications, devices, and other therapies."
